post.text: Join me LIVE in Cleveland, OH!

comment.author: Nicole
comment.text: They had an illegal at the border working to get into Californiat. He let many in. They just these things well hidden . Helicopters came through the Streets of Murrietta . They were trying to find the hundreds he had let in that day!! The border patrol is a joke by San Diego.

replies.author: Nicole
replies.text: Julian that's true. They were coming through the streets. They always do in CA if something like that happens. It was. basically like the show Weeds. They didn't need the underground tunnel, they were given a flag to just walk over.

replies.author: Nicole
replies.text: When I was a kid in Californiat, we had a 9pm curfew. The helicopters would come through the streets at 8:45 telling us we had 15 minutes to be in from of our homes. At about 9-9:15pm the police cars would pass to check that we lived there. They use to be really strict. I see a serious lack of security since a child. You would get stopped a second time driving back to Californiat from TJ. They would check your car to make sure you didn't sneak anybody out. Now as an adult, they were no longer doing that. It was quick to get bank home.
